G

Game - Class in org.project
The Game class represents a game session where two players take turns selecting links from the ends of a chain.
Game(Chain, List<Player>, Scanner) - Constructor for class org.project.Game
Constructs a new Game object with the specified chain and players.
GameTest - Class in org.project
Tests for the Game class.
GameTest() - Constructor for class org.project.GameTest
 
getHead() - Method in class org.project.model.Chain
Returns the first link in the chain.
getName() - Method in class org.project.model.Player
Returns the name of the player.
getNext() - Method in class org.project.model.Link
Returns a reference to the next link in the list.
getPlayerWithHighestScore() - Method in class org.project.Game
Returns the name of the player with the highest score.
getPrev() - Method in class org.project.model.Link
Returns a reference to the previous link in the list.
getScore() - Method in class org.project.model.Player
Returns the score of the player.
getTail() - Method in class org.project.model.Chain
Returns the last link in the chain.
getValue() - Method in class org.project.model.Link
Returns the integer value stored in this link.
